Scaling Workloads
=================

Scaling workloads is easy with `azureml`.

Resources
---------

An unlimited number of each resource is available per Workspace.

Parallel Jobs
-------------

Jobs are submitted to a queue which will run jobs in parallel if the required resources are available. With either cloud or self-hosted compute, thousands of jobs can be submitted and run concurrently.

Managed Endpoints
-----------------

By default, endpoints are managed and automatically scaled.

Accelerating Computation
------------------------

For accelerating computation, there are a number of options.
